data.actual_result: The reaction doesn't get added and it gets send as a normal message
data.expected_result: Your reaction gets added to the message
data.short_description: +:emoji: to quick react doesn't work after the upgrade to React 16
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel and make sure you have permission to react - Type +:emoji: with emoji being the name of an emoji you can use or a Twemoji (also make sure the latest message in the channel isn't a system message)
